alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 8:19PM EDT until July 17 at 8:53AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Still River At Brookfield. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The river begins to flood roads and parking lots. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 13.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 8.9 feet late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.6 feet on 10/15/2005. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Still River Brookfield Flood Stage: 12.0 Observed Stage at Sun 7 pm: 13.9 Forecast: Sun 8 pm 14.0 Mon 2 am 12.6 Mon 8 am 8.7 Mon 2 pm 7.4 Mon 8 pm 7.1 Tue 2 am 7.3 Tue 8 am 7.8 &&
